III Semester

				Corporate Accounting 
				Business Law 
				Banking Theory law and practice 
				Marketing 
				Business Statistics and Operations Research - I 
				Soft Skill - Sopken and Presentation Skills Level I 
				Non-major Elective


IV Semester

				Advanced Corporate Accounting 
				Company Law 
				Financial Services 
				Business Taxation 
				Business Statistics and Operations Research - II 
				Soft Skill - Spoken and Presentation Skills Level II 
				Environment Studies (Exam in IV Sem)
